    • Method Detail

      • getMessageWithUdhInBytes

        public static byte[] getMessageWithUdhInBytes(java.lang.String s,
                              byte dataCoding)
        Get message with UDH to byte[]. This method converts the UDH to byte[] using String.getBytes() and converts the string using DataCodingSpecification.getMessageInBytes(String, byte).
        Parameters:
        s - string message
        dataCoding - data coding
        Returns:
        byte array result
